headline.main: Donald Trump, North Korea, South Sudan: Your Monday Briefing

lead_paragraph: Zhong An Online Property and Casualty Insurance plans to sell  5-10 percent of the company to a couple of strategic investors, to raise up to 10 billion yuan (1.2 billion pounds), ahead of a planned initial public offering in mainland China, according to four people with direct knowledge of the matter.
